body_html: FYI, I’m experimenting on eager execution of Java operations right now and I’m already taking a look on how we can make a better usage of ˋTensor.buffer()ˋ for that purpose. @AndreyFilippov , I can keep you posted of my progress or please do so if you plan to implement something around it, thanks!
